video.title: Chasing Monsters
video.synopsis: Adventurer Cyril Chauquet seeks out the most colossal and dangerous underwater creatures around the world in this adrenaline-packed series.

episodes.synopsis: After meeting a diver who was attacked by a goliath grouper, Cyril vows to catch one of the giants using a primitive and dangerous technique.
episodes.title: Tug of War with Giants

episodes.synopsis: Cyril is recruited to swab the razor-sharp teeth of the ocean's most feared predators to help develop antibiotics for shark bite victims.
episodes.title: Monster Shark Infection

episodes.synopsis: Using only his hands and feet as bait, Cyril sets out to catch a powerful catfish in Oklahoma's muddy waters, home to many deadly species.
episodes.title: Catfish Death Roll

episodes.synopsis: After training with Brazilian special forces, Cyril embarks on a journey deep into the heart of the Amazon rain forest to catch the mighty piraiba.
episodes.title: Surviving the Mighty Piraiba

episodes.synopsis: In Texas, Cyril prepares to face the needle-like fangs of the mysterious alligator gar, while trying his best to avoid another ancient beast.
episodes.title: Alligator vs Prehistoric Fish

episodes.synopsis: To get to Brazil's largest prehistoric fish, the endangered arapaima, Cyril must wade through swamps infested with piranhas, caimans and anacondas.
episodes.title: Amazon Dinosaurs

episodes.synopsis: In an exciting journey that begins at the Notre Dame cathedral, Cyril chases a mysterious giant fish rumored to frequent Paris.
episodes.title: Merciless Beast in Paris

episodes.synopsis: In Cuba, Cyril pursues two elusive beasts: the legendary barracuda and the tarpon, known for its acrobatics and fighting skills.
episodes.title: Relentless Barracuda

episodes.synopsis: Invited by the Innu tribe to track giant lake trout in Canada, Cyril must deal with 4-foot-thick ice, marauding wolves and other new challenges.
episodes.title: Fire and Ice

episodes.synopsis: Inspired by Hemingway’s "The Old Man and the Sea," Cyril sets out to hand-line a monster fish in a tiny boat and ends up in the battle of his life.
episodes.title: Hand to Hand Combat

episodes.synopsis: Cyril braves the wilds of northern Canada to pursue one of the most aggressive fish on the planet, the fang-toothed northern pike.
episodes.title: The Freshwater Wolf

episodes.synopsis: To track invasive species in Florida, Cyril must first earn the trust of the rugged Gladesmen by catching a python and swimming with wild alligators.
episodes.title: Invasive Predators
